title: House with a land for sale in Gelioya
details:
This family inherited land has a private road from the main road and a gated space enough for at least 3 vehicles. Located in Godapola (4km from Peradeniya and 1.3km to Gelioya)

This is an old house with few modern touches to the living room. The house contains 3 bedrooms, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom, 1 servant toilet and a spacious living room. With the large land surrounding the house, this is ideal for nature loving family with kids.

This land is also available to be sold in plots
